ratings.question_text: I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: What is the name of your TA?
comments: None

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-10, if you wish
comments: Q1: the course packet does not follow the class schedule.
This is an excellent class. The only bad thing is we can't take it for two semesters!

The content of the class was properly managed by the teacher. I think there could have been more subject to be treated in class if teacher could have speed up in the class.Excellent effort by the teacher to assist students in small groups.
good.
On the practicum assignments, sometimes we would spend a lot of time just chatting, instead of going trough the important topics.
It reflects the application in the real academic and professional life.

It taught us very useful communication skills as well as improving our English ability.I really like the structure of the lecture since it covers nearly all the useful things for communication. And I also like the practicum because it helps us a lot and gives us lots of opportunites to practice.

It provided the opportunity for the international students to interact and share what they struggle with in terms of the school work and the American culture. The instructions and teaching materials were very useful and insightful.
It provides the student with good advices for improving diverse communication skills.It would be useful throughout my studies and career.
The course was very practical what gave the opportunity to students to get corrected right as they were committing errors.

It offered an opportunity for the international students to communicate with each other about our feelings in the USA. Mr. Vance is nice to us,trying his best to help us adapt to the new life here by encouraging us to speak out using the skills learned in the course.
The course was an excellent opportunity for the integration with other students.Also, very good resources for the assessment of our communication skills.
Pronunciation practice.
Improving my communication skills as well as culture understanding.
good.
Pronunciation and paper'd writing skills. Although very valuable, we had only very few class hours dedicated to it.
diversity in the class.

narratives.question_text: The things about this course most in need of improvement are:
comments: I would like the textbook more logical and corresponding to the lecture. Every time it is difficult for me and my classmates to find the slides.There are still lots of the slides were not explained in the textbook. I hope the instructor can go over them or delete the unnecessary slides.Other parts are great!
The pace for some sections was somewhat slow. I'd really like the professor to enforce stricter guidelines and time frame, because sometimes he can be too much lenient.
Improve the flow of the course materials.
I think it should be a little bit more intense. Sometimes the lecturer explained his points too slowly.
To improve the pace of the course so that more topics are covered, specially in assisting each student in writing and structure skills.
The amount of topics in course doesn't allow to cover all of them with the deep I expected.
not really
excellent.
More focus on what are the students requiring instead of following an specified syllabus. Assignments for the practicum could had been more valuable, sometimes it felt like a hassle.
how to prepare to communicate and present.

narratives.question_text: What was the availability and quality of help you received of the instructor and TA?
comments: The help i received was of great quality, and he was available whenever i needed help.
Usually the instructor was very responsive to asking help. But sometimes he seems too busy with other obligations.
Very good.
The instructor was for an unbelievable availability and his help always answered with our concerns.
It was very helpful and he's always ready to answer our questions.
The professor was always available through email. I think there should be one on one sessions to cover writing structure and skills.
The instructor was always available to answer any question.
We don't have a TA.Prof. Vance is greatly helpful and nice. I so appreciate his help.
Prof. Vance was very helpful and available.
good

narratives.question_text: Discuss if you wish how this course fits into your overall program.
comments: Where i come from, English is not my first language and i didn't have a chance to learn how to be professional in academic life. This course helped a lot on how to link different ideas in environment, how to do presentation in a more professional way.
It is of vital importance because communication is the basic skills for me in the rest of my life!
I'm more than positive that this course will benefit in my entire career life.
I really improved by using the skills taught in the class. Thanks!

This course doesn't really fit in my program. However it was so important for me as it helps me better honing my english communication that will be critical for the issue of my internship application.
As an international student, this course is very relevant because it puts us on the communication level of native speakers and with the preparation a yale student must have.

Before taking the course I thought it would be very useful to improve my communication skills, but at the end I'm not sure the improvements are because the class or because been studying in English 4 months.
It fits my program perfectly, because it gave me basic training to be a professional and learn how to communicate better with others.
Helps on a communications skills.
not good. It should be an optional class (extra curriculum).

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: I took this course to improve my communication skills especially writing skills.
I am required to.
I wanted to improve my English communication skills.
I was required to take it.
I took the course in order to hone my improve my communication skills in english.
To improve my communication efficiency.
I was asked to take the course.
I was required.
Required.
I was required to do so, but I was looking forward to improve my communications skills as well.
I was recommended to.

narratives.question_text: Did it live up to your expectations?
comments: Yes, after every week of class i noticed difference in my communication skills.
Yes. Actually, it is much higher than my expectations.
Yes, although I wish the curriculum was more rigorous.
OK
yes
Yes, the course lived up my expectations.
Almost.
No.
Yes
No, we could had focus more on student's needs.
yes. It is really important to learn how to communicate, but as per the lack of time to navigate throughout the many other classes in FES is tough to go over this class.

narratives.question_text: Did you get out of it what you expected?
comments: Yes
Yes.
Yes
yes

I partially got out of it what I expected. It helps me broaden my english vacabulary and acquaint myself with various communication styles. However, It didn't answer totally to my need to improve my fluency and my public communication.
Yes, but I hope I can get more.
Yes, the course allowed me to obtain the most important guidelines to improve my communicationsskills for the level expected at yale.
Yes
In some aspects, yes. In others, not much.
yes.

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: the time might be a little bit too short
I had the opportunity to practice some topics from the class.

Good thing is that we get a chance to practice what we learned from the class.It would be better if we have more exercises like the negotiationone at the end of the class. But surely I understand the time restraint.

narratives.question_text: For students taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: They should do all their assignments and practice all the materials in a real life. The focus should not be on getting higher grades but on the content of the course.
Keep practice!
Make sure you learn as much as possible from this class.
If you are an international student, take it.
Don't be disappointed if you're required to take it. It worth!
Students have to give their best to attend all the sessions of this class as they are inter-related. Some materials such as headset are for important use.
Try to apply every knowledge acquired in class every day in every situation, to obtain the best results.
Be sure they need the course.
Try to learn as much as possible and review often. It is so useful.

It will definitely help on improving your professional communications skills, but you should also make sure to request to go trough the topics you are most interested. Also, request to work more on paper writing skills. You will end up writing a lot of them, and you should use this course to help on it.
